name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Poem of the Day - New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate Your New Tab Experience with Daily Poetry

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your Chrome's new tab into a daily poetry excursion! This Chrome extension brings you the Poetry Foundation's Poem of the Day, complete with audio recordings when available. Enjoy a simple, stylish display that pairs beautifully with inspiring verses, making each new tab a moment of poetic discovery. Perfect for lovers of art, language, and serene browsing.
